svcproc.title: REFRIGERATOR WIRING
svcproc.para:
Refer to circuit diagram on
for the following discussion. This system includes an ON/OFF switch (613) and power source connector (612).
The refrigerator ON/OFF switch terminal five receives battery power (key ON or OFF) from B2 battery stud through 30A fuse F10-B (located in cab) and sleeper 5A fuse 582-C.

The switch contains two LEDs. One LED illuminates the switch label whenever the key switch is in the ON or ACC position (power to the LED is from the auxiliary bunk blower relay). The other LED is illuminated by battery power from fuse 582-C, whenever the refrigerator switch is ON (key ON or OFF).

Refrigerator switch terminal six delivers power to the refrigerator power source on circuit 86AG. The power source and switch LEDs are grounded through the sleeper and cab harness to cab ground adapter (454).
